103: The Roblox experience you are trying to join is currently not available. Displayed on Xbox when the game is unavailable on this platform.
256: Developer has shut down all game servers or game server has shut down for other reasons. Appears if a player is banned while playing alone.
260: There was a problem receiving data, please reconnect. Possibly a Roblox or local issue preventing data packets.
261: Error while receiving data, please reconnect. Could be poor internet or server issues.
262: Error while sending data, please reconnect. Game cannot load after data fails to send.
264: Same account launched game from different device. Reconnect if you prefer to use this device. Can also indicate rapid rejoin or server crash.
266: Your connection timed out. Check your internet connection and try again.
267: You were kicked from this experience. Can include custom reason messages from the game using :Kick().
268: You have been kicked by server. Could be due to exploits, lag, or compatibility issues (like Wine on Linux).
271: Server was shut down due to no active players. Also appears if reconnecting while server is shutting down.
272: Disconnected due to Security Key Mismatch. Often triggered if an exploit is loaded.
273: Disconnected from game, possibly due to game joined from another device, or user is warned/banned. Reconnect may show error 769/773.
274: The experience's developer has temporarily shut down the experience server. Try again later.
275: Roblox has shut down the server for maintenance, or the game was deleted.
277: Lost connection to the game server, please reconnect. Can happen from internet issues or server overload.
278: You were disconnected for being idle 20 minutes.
279: Failed to connect to the game. Could be due to server crash, website blocks, downtime, or outdated client.
280: Your version of Roblox may be out of date. Update Roblox and try again.
282: Disconnected from game, please reconnect. Could be network issues or game under review.
284: A fatal error occurred while running this game. Often caused by UI overload.
285: Client initiated disconnect. Can occur after error 256/274.
286: Device does not have enough memory to run this experience, or removed from private server.
291: Player has been removed from the DataModel. Sometimes used to kick a player.
292: Device memory low. Leaving preserves state and prevents crashing.
517: This game is currently unavailable. Happens when rejoining a server being closed.
522: Followed user has left the game.
523: Status of the experience has changed, no longer accessible. Can happen if game is unpublished/private.
524: Not authorized to join this game. VIP server, paid access, private server, or Guest access issues.
525: Server is currently busy. Try again later.
528: Your party is too large to join this experience.
529: A HTTP error has occurred. Servers may be down or slow.
533: Privacy settings prevent you from joining this server.
600: You were banned from this experience by the creator.
610: Can't join place. Could be DNS, private server, guest restrictions, Game Pass requirements, unsupported device, or HTTP errors.
769: Teleport failed or reconnect unsuccessful. Can occur after bans/warnings or network issues.
770: Game's root place is not active or teleport target does not exist.
771: Teleport failed, server is no longer available.
773: Teleport failed. Game not approved or restricted. Can appear after private server shutdowns or warnings.
774: Too many teleport requests received. Experience tried to teleport user above limit.
